summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2493, for the improvement of Corliss Avenue, from East Green Lake Boulevard to North 85th Street; and North 80th Street, from the east margin of Corliss Avenue on the south to the west margin of Corliss Avenue on the north, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 27326 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
